category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: A black skin tone modifier, which can be applied to a range of human emoji characters. Type 6 on the Fitzpatrick Scale of skin tones is desc http://emojipedia.org/emoji-modifier-fitzpatrick-type-6/
name: dark skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the dark skin tone modifier is a testament to inclusivity, elegantly applied to characters and figures with Apple's signature smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading. It ensures that a wide spectrum of users can see themselves represented authentically. This modifier, seamlessly integrated into Apple's emoji design, brings depth and realism to digital interactions, allowing for more personalized and meaningful communication.
